channel.title: Error: /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p https://sler.com.br/.*/ -i .+/colunistas/.* -i .+/colunas/.* -i .+/artigos/.* -i .+/trilhas/.* -i .+/category/.* --follow https://sler.com.br/colunistas/carlos-andre-moreira/ --with-body --body-csss div[itemprop="articleBody"] --body-remove-csss div[class="heateor_ffc_facebook_comments"] -T Carlos André Moreira em Sler --title-regex (.+) - Sler --author-from-csss span[class*="meta-author"] > a -n 15 -o ./feeds/carlos-andre-moreira-sler.xml

item.title: newslinkrss error: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str

item.description:
An error occurred when generating this feed.

Command line: /opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss -p https://sler.com.br/.*/ -i .+/colunistas/.* -i .+/colunas/.* -i .+/artigos/.* -i .+/trilhas/.* -i .+/category/.* --follow https://sler.com.br/colunistas/carlos-andre-moreira/ --with-body --body-csss div[itemprop="articleBody"] --body-remove-csss div[class="heateor_ffc_facebook_comments"] -T Carlos André Moreira em Sler --title-regex (.+) - Sler --author-from-csss span[class*="meta-author"] > a -n 15 -o ./feeds/carlos-andre-moreira-sler.xml

Exception: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str

Stack trace: 
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 1838, in main
    make_feed(args)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 924, in make_feed
    req = get_start_page(args, session, base_attrs, link_grabber, curr_url)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/bin/newslinkrss", line 818, in get_start_page
    base_attrs.feed(page_content)
  File "/opt/hostedtoolcache/Python/3.10.12/x64/lib/python3.10/html/parser.py", line 109, in feed
    self.rawdata = self.rawdata + data
TypeError: can only concatenate str (not "NoneType") to str
